---
title: "OOLEY International"
date: "2019-07-18"
---

\[vc_row height="small" us_bg_image_source="media" us_bg_image="6996" us_bg_parallax="vertical" us_bg_overlay_color="rgba(43,43,43,0.42)" content_placement="middle" gap="10px" columns_type="boxes"\]\[vc_column width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f9a02c%22%7D%7D"\]\[vc_column_text css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f9a02c%22%7D%7D"\]

### **OOLEY is a sociocultural project for** **creative capabilities** **development of a person and the society.**

\[/vc_column_text\]\[/vc_column\]\[vc_column width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f6f6f6%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22%230a0a0a%22%7D%7D"\]\[vc_custom_heading text="Our goal is" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="lineatura"\]\[vc_column_text\]To make unleashed creativity easy, accessible and ubiquitous. \[/vc_column_text\]\[/vc_column\]\[vc_column css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22background-color%22%3A%22rgba%28255%2C255%2C255%2C0.9%29%22%2C%22%2Abackground-color%22%3A%22rgb%28255%2C255%2C255%29%22%7D%7D"\]\[vc_column_text\]We research, establish and develop creative processes and spaces so as to shape an environment for people to improve, collaborate and self-realize.\[/vc_column_text\]\[/vc_column\]\[/vc_row\]\[vc_row height="medium" us_bg_image_source="media" us_bg_overlay_color="rgba(96,96,96,0.42)" content_placement="middle" gap="10px" columns_type="boxes"\]\[vc_column css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f9a02c%22%7D%7D"\]\[vc_custom_heading text="Our activities" font_container="tag:h3|text_align:center" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="lineatura" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22margin-top%22%3A%220px%22%2C%22margin-right%22%3A%220px%22%2C%22margin-bottom%22%3A%220px%22%2C%22margin-left%22%3A%220px%22%7D%7D"\]\[/vc_column\]\[vc_column link="url:%23map|||" width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f6f6f6%22%7D%7D" offset="vc_col-xs-12"\]\[vc_custom_heading text="Public workshops map" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="lineatura"\]\[vc_column_text\]

We look for different public creative spaces and collect data about them in our joint catalog.

\[/vc_column_text\]\[/vc_column\]\[vc_column link="url:%23review|||" width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f6f6f6%22%7D%7D" offset="vc_col-xs-12"\]\[vc_custom_heading text="Workshop reviews" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="lineatura"\]\[vc_column_text\]

We explore russian and international experience in establishment and development of various public workshops and makerspaces.

\[/vc_column_text\]\[/vc_column\]\[vc_column link="url:%23practice|||" width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f6f6f6%22%7D%7D" offset="vc_col-xs-12"\]\[vc_custom_heading text="Creative practice" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="lineatura"\]\[vc_column_text\]We test our insights and ideas in the format of different events and social experiments.\[/vc_column_text\]\[/vc_column\]\[vc_column link="url:%23theory|||" width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f6f6f6%22%7D%7D" offset="vc_col-xs-12"\]\[vc_custom_heading text="Theory development" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="lineatura"\]\[vc_column_text\]We universalize all that accumulated experience in the general theory of sustainable open workshops.\[/vc_column_text\]\[/vc_column\]\[/vc_row\]\[vc_row height="medium" us_bg_image_source="media" us_bg_size="initial" # Practice

\[/vc_column_text\]\[/vc_column\]\[/vc_row\]\[vc_row height="medium" us_bg_image_source="media" us_bg_image="7146" us_bg_parallax="still" us_bg_overlay_color="rgba(153,153,153,0.44)" content_placement="middle" disable_element="yes" fadeout_row="fadeout_row_value" enable_overlay="enable_overlay_value" overlay_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.46)" el_id="lomcamp" el_class="compact-headers"\]\[vc_column width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22color%22%3A%22%23ffffff%22%7D%7D"\]\[us_image image="7217" size="medium" align="center" onclick="custom_link" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwww.lom.camp||target:%20\_blank|" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22margin-bottom%22%3A%222em%22%7D%7D"\]\[vc_column_text css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22margin-top%22%3A%220px%22%7D%7D"\]

### üóì 3 ‚Äî 18 –∞–≤–≥—É—Å—Ç–∞ 2019

### üß≠ –°—ë—Ä—Ñ–ª–∞–≥–µ—Ä—å, 80 –∫–º –æ—Ç –ù. –ù–æ–≤–≥–æ—Ä–æ–¥–∞

\[/vc_column_text\]\[/vc_column\]\[vc_column width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22background-color%22%3A%22rgba%28255%2C255%2C255%2C0.82%29%22%2C%22%2Abackground-color%22%3A%22rgb%28255%2C255%2C255%29%22%7D%7D"\]\[vc_column_text\]

# –õ–û–ú: –õ–µ—Å–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç—ã–µ –º–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä—Å–∫–∏–µ

–ú—ã —Ä–∞–∑–≤–æ—Ä–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–µ–º —É–Ω–∏–≤–µ—Ä—Å–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ç–≤–æ—Ä—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ, –æ—Ö–≤–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—é—â–µ–µ –≤—Å–µ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Ä–µ–º–µ—Å–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è. –ú–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä–∞ –æ–±—É—á–∞—é—Ç –Ω–æ–≤–∏—á–∫–æ–≤ –∞–∑–∞–º —Å–≤–æ–µ–≥–æ –∏—Å–∫—É—Å—Å—Ç–≤–∞, –∞ –∫—É—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä—ã –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞—é—Ç —É–º–µ–ª—å—Ü–∞–º —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å –∏—Ö —Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã. –ò –≤—Å—ë —ç—Ç–æ –Ω–∞ —Å–≤–µ–∂–µ–º –≤–æ–∑–¥—É—Ö–µ, —Å –∑–∞—Ä—è–¥–∫–∞–º–∏, –π–æ–≥–æ–π, –≤–µ–≥–µ—Ç–∞—Ä–∏–∞–Ω—Å–∫–æ–π –∫—É—Ö–Ω–µ–π –∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–ª–µ—Ç–æ–≤ —Ñ–∞–Ω—Ç–∞–∑–∏–∏.\[/vc_column_text\]\[us_hwrapper alignment="center" valign="middle" wrap="1"\]\[us_btn label="Lom.camp" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Flom.camp||target:%20_blank|" el_class="lineatura"\]\[/vc_column\]\[vc_column width="1/2"\]\[vc_column_text\][**OOLEY42**](http://ooley.ru/ooley42/) ‚Äì is a small mobile universal workshop that fits into a camper and can be unfolded at any suitable location. It is our experimental facility for practical research of collective creativity and exploration of effective approaches to productive collaboration. You can invite us to make a lecture, a workshop or a any other kind of public creative events or design and architecture projects.\[/vc_column_text\]\[/vc_column\]\[/vc_row\]\[vc_row height="small" us_bg_overlay_color="#f9a02c" content_placement="middle" el_id="theory"\]\[vc_column\]\[vc_column_text\]

# Theory

\[/vc_column_text\]\[/vc_column\]\[/vc_row\]\[vc_row height="large" us_bg_image_source="media" us_bg_image="5380" us_bg_parallax="still" us_bg_repeat="no-repeat" us_bg_overlay_color="rgba(229,229,229,0.7)" content_placement="bottom" gap="17.5px"\]\[vc_column\]\[vc_column_text\]

## Creativity is an intentional enhancement of the reality.

\[/vc_column_text\]\[/vc_column\]\[/vc_row\]\[vc_row height="medium" color_scheme="alternate" us_bg_image_source="media" us_bg_parallax="vertical" content_placement="middle" gap="10px" columns_type="boxes"\]\[vc_column css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%2351b27b%22%7D%7D"\]\[vc_column_text\]

## Public workshop is a space for, capabilities and the process of creative collaboration.

\[/vc_column_text\]\[/vc_column\]\[vc_column link="|||" width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23dddddd%22%7D%7D" offset="vc_col-xs-12"\]\[vc_custom_heading text="Public space" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="lineatura"\]\[vc_column_text\]for all sorts of making by guests and residents.\[/vc_column_text\]\[/vc_column\]\[vc_column link="|||" width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23eaeaea%22%7D%7D" offset="vc_col-xs-12"\]\[vc_custom_heading text="Capabilities" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="lineatura"\]\[vc_column_text\]

provided with various equipment and proper materials supply.

\[/vc_column_text\]\[/vc_column\]\[vc_column link="|||" width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f2f2f2%22%7D%7D" offset="vc_col-xs-12"\]\[vc_custom_heading text="Free exchange" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="lineatura"\]\[vc_column_text\]

of tip and tricks, of skills and products, that are aquired during learning, researching, experimenting and working on different projects.

\[/vc_column_text\]\[/vc_column\]\[vc_column link="|||" width="1/2" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23f9f9f9%22%7D%7D" offset="vc_col-xs-12"\]\[vc_custom_heading text="Active social climate" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="lineatura"\]\[vc_column_text\]of creative collaboration with transparent principles of all process participants collaboration.\[/vc_column_text\]\[/vc_column\]\[vc_column css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-top%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-right%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-bottom%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2218px%22%2C%22background-color%22%3A%22%23e5e5e5%22%7D%7D"\]\[vc_custom_heading text="Stable attention" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="lineatura"\]\[vc_column_text\]of paricipants to their projects and also their commitment to collaborate on shared endeavours.\[/vc_column_text\]\[/vc_column\]\[/vc_row\]\[vc_row height="large" width="full" color_scheme="alternate" us_bg_overlay_color="#adadad" content_placement="middle" columns_type="boxes" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22padding-right%22%3A%2236px%22%2C%22padding-left%22%3A%2236px%22%7D%7D"\]\[vc_column use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="lineatura" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22margin-bottom%22%3A%2242px%22%7D%7D"\]\[us_carousel taxonomy_category="international,theory" items_quantity=""
